_comment: Configuration file for Prop-Maker Feather Crow Bird
_description: Modify these settings to customize your bird's behavior. Save and reset board for changes to take effect.

button._note: Global control: Long press = cycle modes, Short press = mode action

pins._note: Servo and audio use built-in hardware - no pin config needed

sensors._threshold_note: 0-65535, higher = need more light to activate. with 2000ohms resistance, very dark gives ~300, light around 6000

servo._speed_note: Delay between steps in seconds - lower = faster

clock._note: Clock mode settings - chimes 1-12 times per hour

_mode_descriptions._description: Information about available modes - modify 'available_modes' array above to enable/disable
_mode_descriptions.default: Standard timed operation - checks conditions every interval and performs actions
_mode_descriptions.clock: Hourly chime mode - chimes 1-12 times based on current hour setting
_mode_descriptions.debug: Component testing and diagnostics - tests all hardware individually
_mode_descriptions.button_test: Button functionality testing - comprehensive button diagnostics
_mode_descriptions.battery_monitor: Ultra low power battery monitoring - periodic status checks with deep sleep

_presets._description: Copy these values to main config for different behaviors
